display_long_description:
Hello Virtua Athlete!

Welcome to the future of digital fitness with VirtuaSports. Ride, run, and row through exciting virtual worlds together with your friends —all from the comfort of your home. 

Get ready for some friendly competition in multiplayer mode or challenge our AI players if you're flying solo. With the VirtuaSports mobile app you can keep track of your activities and progress, access video workouts and join our community.

We are continuously improving our app, so please join and download our mobile app to provide feedback. If you want to support us and get access to special features, you can become PRO at virtuasports.com. 

Thanks for your interest and we are looking forward to build the future of fitness with you!

The Virtuasports team
